body: So I recently got a $30 Visa Debit Gift Card, and I tried buying a new minecraft account with it, but it comes up with this error on the website, it's not only me, it seems to be happening to some of my friends also. Any help please? Also, all the information for the Debit Card and Location are right, so that isn't the problem.
body_tagged: So I recently got a $30 Visa Debit Gift Card, and I tried buying a new minecraft account with it, but it comes up with this error on the website, it's not only me, it seems to be happening to some of my friends also. Any help please? Also, all the information for the Debit Card and Location are right, so that isn't the problem.
title: Minecraft Account Purchasing Problem

replies.body:
Personally, I've never had troubles with purchasing an account. But here's a few things I would've tried...

  • Reload the page.
  • Re-enter your information
  • Contact credit card company.
  • Contact Mojang.
I don't know if this will help...
And you don't have to do any of the things I said in a listed order.
replies.body_tagged:
Personally, I've never had troubles with purchasing an account. But here's a few things I would've tried...

  • Reload the page.
  • Re-enter your information
  • Contact credit card company.
  • Contact Mojang.
I don't know if this will help...
And you don't have to do any of the things I said in a listed order.

replies.body:
Did you purchase it on the Minecraft website?
You should try it on the Mojang website.

It also might be a problem with where you live...
For some reason, Mojang has trouble with people purchasing accounts from places other than US and UK and such..

replies.body:
For most cards, you'll have to call in to register the card so you can complete the transaction. (: Try searching up the website for the card to call and register the card.

Make sure to check to see if the card hasn't expired ;)

replies.body:
At this point, I'd contact the person that gave you the card to see if they activated it or anything along those lines. 
Second, make sure that you typed in the correct information into the website.
Third, if any of these options don't work out, you're always welcome to Skype me about this, and I can fix this for you. :)

If you have to use this in the USA, I'll be more than happy for you to contact me so we can get this resolved :) and I'll get back to you as soon as I can :)
replies.body_tagged:
At this point, I'd contact the person that gave you the card to see if they activated it or anything along those lines. 
Second, make sure that you typed in the correct information into the website.
Third, if any of these options don't work out, you're always welcome to Skype me about this, and I can fix this for you. :)

If you have to use this in the USA, I'll be more than happy for you to contact me so we can get this resolved :) and I'll get back to you as soon as I can :)
